description: TECO is a powerful text editing language available under most DEC (Digital Equipment Corporation) operating systems. TECO may be used to edit any form of ASCII text: program sources, command procedures, or manuscripts, for example.  TECO is a character-oriented editor, and also offers a number of facilities for dealing with lines of text. SciTECO is an interactive TECO dialect, similar to Video TECO.
author: Robin Haberkorn
